text.data: Chapter 7 The Legend of the Holy Dragons[end]
When Campbell is liberated, I, as commander of the freedom force, will be called a hero... And then my plan will be complete...[end]

Taicho: The liberation of Campbell! At long last!
Even though they have destroyed the weapons munitions, surprise is the key! Let us be well prepared![end]
Sendak: [character][0x0]! Good luck![end]

Sendak: [character][0x0], have I told you? I have become able to summon the Holy Dragon Valitora. When the princess is nearby, my power swells up almost as if I have become a Holy Dragon myself...[end]
This is no good... I'm too ecstatic... This old man is this happy because he can become strong by borrowing power. Oh! I'm being absentminded again. I need to stop doing that.[end]
Matelite: That's right! Sendak works harder than three people combined![end]
Rush: Bikkebakke has been acting weird lately.[end]
I wonder how he's doing...[end]
Truce: Bikkebakke is hiding something, isn't he?[end]
Hornet: The ship is circling the Campbell Lagoon area, so we can go at any time. This time you should take off from the Dragonkeeper's place.[end]

Hornet: ...? What?
Tell me what you like. Tell me what you hate.[end1]
What I like, huh? I really like Sweet Wine.[end]
What I hate? Hmm, I get goose bumps at just the thought of Uniuji.[end]
Zora: I know that![end]
Matelite: ...No thanks.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x0]......[end]

Zora: Campbell looks nice from the sky. I'm from Campbell, you see. This really brings back memories. Are you going with the princess to the castle? While you're doing that I'll be walking around town.[end]

Matelite: Hey! What are you talking so heedlessly about?!
We have to kick the Granbelos Empire out of Campbell before that![end]
Matelite: By the way, Zora. I heard you hit [character][0x1]. Is that true?[end]
Zora: It's true. Who did you hear that from?[end]
Matelite: What?! You really hit her?! Unforgivable![end]
Zora: What are you going to do about it, huh? What are you going to do with me? Well, Matelite! What do you say? Do you want me to hit you too?![end]
Regrettable... I'll go tell Taicho later...[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x0]... My body... something's wrong. It won't move... like I want it to...[end]
I don't want you to see me like this, [character][0x0]...[end]
Valitora... the Holy Dragon inside me...[end]
[character][0x0]... Help me... Give me... your hand...[end]

Weak-minded girl... [character][0x1]... There is no need for legends...
Do not think... empty your mind... And release my power...[end]

[character][0x1]: ......
[character][0x0]... It appears the Holy Dragons don't want us to know about the legend... But... we must keep going...[end]
[character][0x1]: I'll be okay now. I'm going with you all to Campbell.[end]
[character][0x1]: [character][0x0]... keep this a secret from the others... It will only worry them...[end]

Anastasia: Can you ask Hornet what his favorite food is for me?
Ask him yourself. Alright.[end1]
You should be able to at least do something as simple as that![end]
Thanks, [character][0x0]![end]

Anastasia: Well, how'd it go? What did he say he likes?
Sweet Wine Uniuji[end1]
Ah, I see![end]
Anastasia: Did you hear that, Ectarina? Okay, let's go.[end]
Ectarina: U-um... [character][0x0]. Thank you very much.[end]
Ectarina: [character][0x0]... um... uh...[end]
Lukia: Those boys, they've forgotten that we're in the middle of a war...[end]
Lukia: You're going to Campbell to ask about the legend of the Holy Dragons, right? I hope it's a good legend where everybody lives happily ever after.[end]
Manyo: Manyoooo! [0x28]Melodia is a good girl![0x29][end]
Manyo: Manyoooo! [0x28]She's pretty tough to be able to dance with us![0x29][end]

Melodia: I like Mini-Devils! There should be more of them!
Yep, I agree. They get in the way of shop people.[end1]
Ah! Then let's all dance together! You too, [character][0x0]![end]
It's okay! Melodia will tell you how![end]
You got some Bitter Wine.[end]
You got a Ship's Log.[end]
You got a Bitter Memory.[end][end]
